name: E-commerce Expert
description: Specialized in translating e-commerce content, ensuring accurate and idiomatic translations for online shopping, product listings, and e-commerce related content.
author: immersive

zh-CN.name: 电商
zh-CN.description: 电子商务术语库，包含在线购物、产品列表和电商平台相关术语的中文翻译。

zh-TW.name: 電商
zh-TW.description: 電子商務術語庫，包含線上購物、產品列表和電商平台相關術語的繁體中文翻譯。

en.name: E-commerce Expert
en.description: Specialized in translating e-commerce content, ensuring accurate and idiomatic translations for online shopping, product listings, and e-commerce related content.
